str2: To want for myself; I want, need; I beg, request, beseech, pray. Middle voice of deo; to beg, i.e. Petition.

str2: From para and eimi; to be near, i.e. At hand; neuter present participle time being, or property.

word: I may not need to be
str2: To be courageous, confident, of good cheer. Another form for tharseo; to exercise courage.
Confidence, trust, reliance. From the perfect of the alternate of pascho; reliance.

str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.
